description: Bio Natural Solutions is a pioneering company that utilizes circular economy principles and biotechnology to create natural disinfectants and coatings for fruits and vegetables, derived from organic waste. Founded in 2017, its mission is to extend food shelf life, reduce waste, and eliminate harmful chemicals, promoting sustainable agricultural practices. The company actively collaborates with universities and farmers to raise awareness and foster research, positioning itself as a leader in organic solutions within the agricultural sector.
name: Bio Natural Solutions
